text:
A trap door or trapdoor is a door in the ground or in a floor, that one enters vertically. Some can open when someone is standing on it.
Trap doors are popular in mystery themed movies. The victim who falls down the trap door often is met with danger or a hidden treasure. A standard cliché deals with the victim finding himself in an alligator filled swamp (most famously seen in "Scooby Doo" cartoons).
